Row.Text: As the popularity of bathing continues to rise, so too does demand. Citizens in your empire demand additional baths, however elites and aristocrats protest this, stating that baths are a luxury. Your advisors need your input on this. How do you feel?
The unwashed masses should remain unwashed.
Receive a free Great Person of your choice.
Spare no expense - the people shall be clean!
+1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness in all Cities. All Baths cost an additional 3 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.
Encourage people to find more...creative means of getting clean.
Your farmers discovered a rare plant never before seen in a Plantation near the City. Your researchers are excited about studying it! Gain +{2_InstantYield}.
